002.text: When summer came, a little bear and a kitten went fishing together.

003.text: They sat by the river and expexted fish to come.

004.text: They didn't catch any fish, although they had been waiting for a long time.

005.text: 'Why isn't there any fish here?' The kitten anxiously asked.

006.text: 'Be quiet! Don't scare the fish away!' Said the little bear.

007.text: The kitten nodded his head and they keep waiting for fish to swallow the bait.

008.008: They continued waiting for a long time but counln't catch any fish. The kitten told the little bear: 'I give up! I am going to play!'
